憼憼憼
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 敬, 心, 茍, 儆, 警
Связанные персонажи: Уважение, Сердце, Гоу, Предупреждение, Полиция

憼字的基本解释

憼
jǐng
古同“儆”。警示，警告，警醒。

憼
jìng
古同“敬”。

憼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jǐng］
［《廣韻》居影切，上梗，見。］
［《廣韻》居兩切，上養，見。］
同“儆1”。
戒备；警戒。

憼字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憼； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页404第46
【唐韻】居影切【集韻】舉影切，?音景。【說文】敬也。从心敬聲。與儆通。【荀子·佹詩】無私罪人，憼革二兵。【註】憼，戒也。革，甲也。二，副也。言無私心而治有罪之人，反恐爲所害，而常爲兵革，以備之也。　又【廣韻】居兩切【集韻】舉兩切，?音繈。義同。　又【集韻】居慶切。與敬同。本作敬。或从心。【說文】肅也。

憼字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
憼字的起名意思

戒备；警戒。

Humble
Basic explanation of words
Humble
jǐng
Gu Tong "warned". Warning, warning, alert.
Humble
jìng
Gu Tong "respect".
Humble
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jǐng］
["Guangyun" Juying in the shadows, on the stem, see you. ]
["Guangyun" has two cuts, the upper one, see you. ]
Same as "儆1".
Vigilance; vigilance.
Humble
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　憼; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 404 46
[Tang Yun] Juying and cutting [Jiyun] Lifting the shadow and cutting,? Soundscape. [Said Wen] Jing Ye. Respect from the heart. And confidant. [Xunzi·Yi Poem] The selfless sinner, the two soldiers who suppressed the revolution. [Note] Shun, quit too. Leather, Jia also. Second, vice also. Treating the guilty unselfishly, fighting terrorism as a victim, and often a military revolution to prepare for it.　[Guangyun] Juice two cuts [Jiyun] Two cuts,? Yin Yu. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Ju Qingqie again. Same with Jing. This is a respect. Or from the heart. [Said Wen] Su Ye.
